item.description:
Hello Everyone,

It's going to be cold on Saturday morning but some of us are going to do a 5 mile loop (in the opposite direction towards Harvard Business School) before joining the main breakfast group run at 10.30 to do the usual 5 miles. Hoping for an 8-8.30 min/mile pace to stay warm!

Meeting at 9.30am from the usual spot near Dave's house... see you there if you fancy it.

Incredibly obvious but it's going to be freezing so remember to bring head gear, gloves and layers etc.

Take care... Martin
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be stretching next to my blue VW

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 10 in 10 degrees
